痛不欲生.definition: to be so in pain as to not want to live; to be so grieved as to wish one were dead

痛失.definition: to suffer the painful loss of (a loved one etc); to miss out on (an opportunity); to fail to gain (victory etc)

痛定思痛.definition: to think of the pain when the pain is gone (idiom); to ponder about a painful experience

痛心疾首.definition: bitter and hateful (idiom); to grieve and lament (over sth)

痛快.definition: delighted; to one's heart's content; straightforward; also pr. [tong4 kuai5]

痛快淋漓.definition: joyous; hearty; spirited; (of commentary) trenchant; incisive

痛恨.definition: to detest; to loathe; to abhor

痛擊.definition: to deliver a punishing attack; to deal a heavy blow

痛改前非.definition: completely correcting one's former misdeeds (idiom); to repent past mistakes and turn over a new leaf; a reformed character

痛斥.definition: to criticize harshly; to denounce; to attack viciously

痛痛快快.definition: immediately; without a moment's hesitation; with alacrity; firing from the hip

痛癢.definition: pain and itch; sufferings; importance; consequence

痛砭時弊.definition: to strongly criticize the evils of the day

痛罵.definition: to bawl out; to reprimand severely
